insandida mik du ganasjan þans gamalwidans hairtin, LUKE 4.19 merjan frahunþanaim fralet jah blindaim siun, fraletan gamaidans in gaþrafstein, merjan jer fraujins andanem.
LUKE 4.20 jah faifalþ þos bokos jah usgibands andbahta gasat.
jah allaim in þizai swnagogein wesun augona fairweitjandona du imma.
LUKE 4.21 dugann þan rodjan du im þatei
himma daga usfullnodedun mela þo in ausam izwaraim.
LUKE 4.22 jah allai alakjo weitwodidedun imma jah sildaleikidedun bi þo waurda anstais þo usgaggandona us munþa is jah qeþun:
niu sa ist sunus Iosefis?
LUKE 4.23 jah qaþ du im:
aufto qiþiþ mis þo gajukon:
þu leiki, hailei þuk silban;
ƕan filu hausidedum waurþan in Kafarnaum, tawei jah her in gabaurþai þeinai.
LUKE 4.24 qaþ þan:
amen izwis qiþa, þatei ni ainshun praufete andanems ist in gabaurþai seinai:
LUKE 4.25 aþþan bi sunjai qiþa izwis þatei managos widuwons wesun in dagam Heleiins in Israela, þan galuknoda himins du jeram þrim jah menoþs saihs, swe warþ huhrus mikils and alla airþa:
LUKE 4.26 jah ni du ainaihun þizo insandiþs was Helias, alja in Saraipta Seidonais du qinon widuwon.
LUKE 4.27 jah managai þrutsfillai wesun uf Haileisaiu praufetau in Israela, jah ni ainshun ize gahrainids was, alja Naiman sa Saur.
LUKE 4.28 jah fullai waurþun allai modis in þizai swnagogein hausjandans þata.
LUKE 4.29 jah usstandans uskusun imma ut us baurg jah brahtedun ina und auhmisto þis fairgunjis ana þammei so baurgs ize gatimrida was, du afdrausjan ina þaþro.
LUKE 4.30 iþ is þairhleiþands þairh midjans ins iddja.
LUKE 4.31 jah galaiþ in Kafarnaum, baurg Galeilaias jah was laisjands ins in sabbatim.
LUKE 4.32 jah sildaleikidedun bi þo laisein is, unte in waldufnja was waurd is.
LUKE 4.33 jah in þizai swnagogein was manna habands ahman unhulþons unhrainjana jah ufhropida, LUKE 4.34 qiþands:
let!
ƕa uns jah þus, Iesu Nazorenu?
qamt fraqistjan unsis?
kann þuk, ƕas is,
sa weiha gudis.
LUKE 4.35 jah gaƕotida imma Iesus qiþands:
afdobn jah usgagg us þamma.
jah gawairpands ina sa unhulþa in midjaim urrann af imma, ni waihtai gaskaþjands imma.
LUKE 4.36 jah warþ afslauþnan ana allans, jah rodidedun du sis misso qiþandans:
ƕa waurde þata, þatei miþ waldufnja jah mahtai anabiudiþ þaim unhrainjam ahmam jah usgaggand?
LUKE 4.37 jah usiddja meriþa fram imma and allans stadins þis bisunjane landis.
LUKE 4.38 usstandands þan us þizai swnagogai galaiþ in gard Seimonis.
swaihro þan þis Seimonis was anahabaida brinnon mikilai, jah bedun ina bi þo.
LUKE 4.39 jah atstandands ufar ija gasok þizai brinnon, jah aflailot ija.
sunsaiw þan usstandandei andbahtida im.
LUKE 4.40 miþþanei þan sagq sunno, allai swa managai swe habaidedun siukans sauhtim missaleikaim, brahtedun ins at imma:
iþ is ainƕarjammeh ize handuns analagjands gahailida ins.
LUKE 4.41 usiddjedun þan jah unhulþons af managaim hropjandeins jah qiþandeins þatei
þu is Xristus, sunus gudis.
jah gasakands im ni lailot þos rodjan, unte wissedun Xristu ina wisan.
LUKE 4.42 biþeh þan warþ dags, usgaggands galaiþ ana auþjana stad, jah manageins sokidedun ina jah qemun und ina jah gahabaidedun ina, ei ni afliþi fairra im.
LUKE 4.43 þaruh is qaþ du im þatei
jah þaim anþaraim baurgim wailamerjan ik skal bi þiudangardja gudis, unte duþe mik insandida.
LUKE 4.44 jah was merjands in swnagogim Galeilaias.

LUKE 5.1 Jah warþ, miþþanei managei anatramp ina du hausjan waurd gudis, jah is silba was standands neƕa saiwa Gainnesaraiþ, LUKE 5.2 jah gasaƕ twa skipa standandona at þamma saiwa, iþ fiskjans afgaggandans af im usþwohun natja.
LUKE 5.3 galaiþ þan in ain þize skipe, þatei was Seimonis;
haihait ina aftiuhan fairra staþa leitil jah gasitands laisida us þamma skipa manageins.
